comment: He is unclear, unfocused, and I felt like I learned nothing; we only had time for 2 of the planned 4 tests because he rambles uselessly and attempts to get the class involved even if you just say one word. Covered little to no material that friends did in their hist 2110 classes. Frustrating to listen to and attempt to take notes from his babbling.

Professor Hill def. knows everything about history.  However he will debate you on everything and never let you finish a sentance before he interupts you.  I had someone sign me in most of the time so i went like once every two weeks.  We took 2 test all semester and both were a joke.  Very Opinionated.  But a joke of a class easy A.

Knows everything about history but is biased beyond words to his own opinions.  Disorganized, creepy, and wont let you finish a sentence.  Getting a decent grade is rather easy if you participate in class but you will have to be able to put up with his personality.
